page.title: 09CHELTENHAM NURSERIES
page.content: {CHELTENHAM }has always been renowned for its floral displays in parks and gardens and along the roads and streets. This year it won the Britain in Bloom competition. The most attractive town. The Parks Dept. Nurseries occupy a site of 18 acres. There are 10 large glasshouses and here they grow all the flowers and plants for the parks,gardens,traffic islands and public buildings in the town. All the greenhouses are different for the conditions required for each plant. The gardens are changed 2 or 3 times a year and at peak times, 80 men are employed in preparing and planting. It cost Â£20,000 a year just to repair gardens that are vandalised. The whole project costs a great deal of money but it is thought to be worth it to attract tourists to the town.
